html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11622023-11-24HC
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
Tobacco and Vaping Products Act
Canada Consumer Product Safety Act
Food and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Health Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN HEALTH CANADA REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) clarify a cross-reference to section numbering; (2) correct discrepancies between the French and English text of the regulations; (3) correct typographical or grammatical errors; (4) harmonize terms with those used in related regulations; (5) correct terminology discrepancies; (6) improve clarity for various provisions; (7) renumber certain sections; and (8) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0247 Publication Date: 2023-12-06
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Controlled Drugs and Substances ActTobacco and Vaping Products ActCanada Consumer Product Safety ActFood and Drugs Act
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Department of  Health Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN HEALTH CANADA REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) clarify a cross-reference to section numbering; (2) correct discrepancies between the French and English text of the regulations; (3) correct typographical or grammatical errors; (4) harmonize terms with those used in related regulations; (5) correct terminology discrepancies; (6) improve clarity for various provisions; (7) renumber certain sections; and (8) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
